snippet: Researchers have identified new assessment scales to determine the likelihood of death within six months to five years, helping doctors avoid overtesting and overtreatment of older patients.
abstract: Researchers identify new assessment scales to determine likelihood of death within six months to five years, helping doctors avoid overtesting and overtreatment of older patients; fashion interactive tools of the most accurate and useful assessments; study is published in The Journal of the American Medical Association and posted on Web site.
